medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has had umbilical pain for the past 3 days, with no associated fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, or constipation. Appetite has remained normal.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Metastatic ovarian cancer, status post debulking surgery. History of chronic hepatitis C with liver biopsy showing stage 1 fibrosis and grade 1 inflammation. Previous cytoreductive surgery and evidence of malignancy in multiple sites including the liver and lung.
